properties.description: The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: availability_zone
properties.description: (Required) Availability zone where instance is located. such as: cn-bj2-02. You may refer to list of availability zone

properties.name: image_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID for the image to use for the instance.

properties.name: instance_type
properties.description:
• instance_type - (Required) The type of instance, please visit the instance type table

    Note If you want to update this value, you must set allow_stopping_for_updateto true.
<hr/>

properties.name: allow_stopping_for_update
properties.description: • allow_stopping_for_update - (Optional) If you try to update some properties which requires stopping the instance, you must set allow_stopping_for_update to true in your config to allows Terraform to stop the instance to update its properties like instance_type, root_password, boot_disk_size, data_disk_size.

properties.name: root_password
properties.description: • root_password - (Optional) The password for the instance, which contains 8-30 characters, and at least 2 items of capital letters, lower case letters, numbers and special characters. The special characters include `()~!@#$%&*-+=_|{}[]:;'<>,.?/.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: availability_zone
properties.description: (Required) Availability zone where cloud disk is located. Such as: "cn-bj2-02". You may refer to list of availability zone.

properties.name: disk_size
properties.description: (Required) The size of disk. Purchase the size of disk in GB. 1-8000 for a cloud disk, 1-4000 for SSD cloud disk. If the disk have attached to the instance, the instance will reboot automatically to make the change take effect when update the disk_size.
<hr/>

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of disk, should have 6-63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_'. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a name beginning with tf-disk.

properties.name: disk_type
properties.description: (Optional) The type of disk. Possible values are: data_diskas cloud disk, ssd_data_disk as ssd cloud disk, rssd_data_disk as RDMA-SSD cloud disk (the rssd_data_disk only be supported in cn-bj2-05).(Default: data_disk).

properties.name: charge_type
properties.description: (Optional) Charge type of disk. Possible values are: year as pay by year, month as pay by month, dynamic as pay by hour. (Default: month).

properties.name: duration
properties.description: (Optional) The duration that you will buy the resource. (Default: 1). It is not required when dynamic (pay by hour), the value is 0 when month(pay by month) and the disk will be vaild till the last day of that month.

properties.name: tag
properties.description: (Optional) A tag assigned to VPC, which contains at most 63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_', and '.'. If it is not filled in or a empty string is filled in, then default tag will be assigned. (Default: Default).
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: availability_zone
properties.description: (Required) The Zone to attach the disk in.

properties.name: instance_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of host instance.

properties.name: disk_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of disk that needs to be attached
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the isolation group information which contains 1-63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_', '.', ',', '[', ']', ':'. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a name beginning with tf-isolation-group.

properties.name: remark
properties.description: (Optional) The remarks of the isolation group. (Default: "").
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: rules
properties.description: (Required) A list of security group rules. Can be specified multiple times for each rules. Each rules supports fields documented below.
<hr/>

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the security group which contains 1-63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_' and '.'. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a name beginning with tf-security-group.

properties.name: remark
properties.description: (Optional) The remarks of the security group. (Default: "").

properties.name: tag
properties.description: (Optional) A tag assigned to security group, which contains at most 63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_', and '.'. If it is not filled in or a empty string is filled in, then default tag will be assigned. (Default: Default).

properties.name: block-rules
properties.description: » Block rules
The rules mapping supports the following:

properties.name: port_range
properties.description: (Optional) The range of port numbers, range: 1-65535. (eg: port or port1-port2).

properties.name: cidr_block
properties.description: (Optional) The cidr block of source.

properties.name: policy
properties.description: (Optional) Authorization policy. Possible values are: accept, drop.

properties.name: priority
properties.description: (Optional) Rule priority. Possible values are: high, medium, low.

properties.name: protocol
properties.description: (Optional) The protocol. Possible values are: tcp, udp, icmp, gre.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: internet_type
properties.description: (Required) Type of Elastic IP routes. Possible values are: international as international BGP IP and bgp as china mainland BGP IP.
<hr/>

properties.name: bandwidth
properties.description: (Optional) Maximum bandwidth to the elastic public network, measured in Mbps (Mega bit per second). The ranges for bandwidth are: 1-200 for pay by traffic, 1-800 for pay by bandwidth. (Default: 1).

properties.name: share_bandwidth_package_id
properties.description: (Optional) The￿ Id of Share Bandwidth Package. If it is filled in, the charge_mode can only be set with share_bandwidth.

properties.name: duration
properties.description: (Optional) The duration that you will buy the resource. (Default: 1). It is not required when dynamic (pay by hour), the value is 0 when month(pay by month) and the instance will be valid till the last day of that month.

properties.name: charge_mode
properties.description: -(Optional) Elastic IP charge mode. Possible values are: traffic as pay by traffic, bandwidth as pay by bandwidth, share_bandwidth as share bandwidth mode. (Default: bandwidthfor the Elastic IP, share_bandwidth for the Elastic IP with share bandwidth mode).

properties.name: charge_type
properties.description: (Optional) Elastic IP charge type. Possible values are: year as pay by year, month as pay by month, dynamic as pay by hour (specific permission required). (Default: month).

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the EIP, which contains 1-63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_', '.'. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a name beginning with tf-eip.

properties.name: remark
properties.description: (Optional) The remarks of the EIP. (Default: "").

properties.name: tag
properties.description: (Optional) A tag assigned to Elastic IP, which contains at most 63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_', and '.'. If it is not filled in or a empty string is filled in, then default tag will be assigned. (Default: Default).
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: eip_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of EIP.

properties.name: resource_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of resource with EIP attached.

properties.name: resource_type
properties.description: Deprecated, attribute resource_type is deprecated for optimizing parameters.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: internal
properties.description: (Optional) Indicate whether the load balancer is intranet mode.(Default: "false")

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the load balancer. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a name beginning with tf-lb.

properties.name: charge_type
properties.description: Deprecated, argument charge_type is deprecated for optimizing parameters.

properties.name: vpc_id
properties.description: (Optional) The ID of the VPC linked to the Load balancer, This argument is not required if default VPC.

properties.name: subnet_id
properties.description: (Optional) The ID of subnet that intranet load balancer belongs to. This argument is not required if default subnet.

properties.name: tag
properties.description: (Optional) A tag assigned to load balancer, which contains at most 63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_', and '.'. If it is not filled in or a empty string is filled in, then default tag will be assigned. (Default: Default).

properties.name: remark
properties.description: (Optional) The remarks of the load balancer. (Default: "").
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: load_balancer_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of a load balancer.

properties.name: listener_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of a listener server.

properties.name: resource_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of a backend server.
<hr/>

properties.name: resource_type
properties.description: Deprecated, attribute resource_type is deprecated for optimizing parameters.

properties.name: port
properties.description: (Optional) Port opened on the backend server to receive requests, range: 1-65535, (Default: 80).
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: load_balancer_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of load balancer instance.

properties.name: protocol
properties.description: (Required) Listener protocol. Possible values: http, https, tcp if listen_type is request_proxy, tcp and udp if listen_type is packets_transmit.
<hr/>

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the listener. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a name beginning with tf-lb-listener.

properties.name: listen_type
properties.description: (Optional) The type of listener. Possible values are request_proxy and packets_transmit. When packets_transmit was specified, you need to config the instances by yourself if the instances attach to the load balancer. You may refer to configuration instruction.

properties.name: port
properties.description: (Optional) Port opened on the listeners to receive requests, range: 1-65535. The default value: 80 as protocol is http, 443 as protocol is https, 1024 as protocol is tcp or udp.

properties.name: idle_timeout
properties.description: (Optional) Amount of time in seconds to wait for the response for in between two sessions if listen_type is request_proxy, range: 0-86400. (Default: 60). Amount of time in seconds to wait for one session if listen_type is packets_transmit, range: 60-900. The session will be closed as soon as no response if it is 0.

properties.name: list description
consistent_hash
properties.description: • The consistent_hash, source_port , consistent_hash_port, roundrobin, source and weight_roundrobin are valid if listen_type is packets_transmit.

properties.name: roundrobin
properties.description: • The roundrobin, source and weight_roundrobin and leastconn are valid if listen_type is request_proxy.

properties.name: persistence
properties.description: (Optional) Indicate whether the persistence session is enabled, it is invalid if persistence_type is none, an auto-generated string will be exported if persistence_type is server_insert, a custom string will be exported if persistence_type is user_defined.

properties.name: persistence_type
properties.description: (Optional) The type of session persistence of listener. Possible values are: none as disabled, server_insert as auto-generated key and user_defined as customized key. (Default: none).

properties.name: health_check_type
properties.description: (Optional) Health check method. Possible values are port as port checking and path as http checking.

properties.name: path
properties.description: (Optional) Health check path checking.

properties.name: domain
properties.description: (Optional) Health check domain checking.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: load_balancer_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of a load balancer.

properties.name: listener_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of a listener server.

properties.name: backend_ids
properties.description: (Required) The IDs of the backend servers where rule applies, this argument is populated base on the backend_id responded from lb_attachment create.
<hr/>

properties.name: path
properties.description: (Optional) The path of Content forward matching fields. path and domain cannot coexist. path and domain must be filled in one.

properties.name: domain
properties.description: (Optional) The domain of content forward matching fields. path and domain cannot coexist. path and domain must be filled in one.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: private_key
properties.description: (Required) The content of the private key about ssl certificate.

properties.name: user_cert
properties.description: (Required) The content of the user certificate about ssl certificate.
<hr/>

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the LB ssl, which contains 1-63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_', '.'. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a name beginning with tf-lb-ssl.

properties.name: ca_cert
properties.description: (Optional) The content of the CA certificate about ssl certificate.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: ssl_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of SSL certificate.

properties.name: load_balance_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of load balancer instance.

properties.name: listener_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of listener servers.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: cidr_blocks
properties.description: (Required) The CIDR blocks of VPC.
<hr/>

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of VPC. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a name beginning with tf-vpc.

properties.name: tag
properties.description: (Optional) A tag assigned to VPC, which contains at most 63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_', and '.'. If it is not filled in or a empty string is filled in, then default tag will be assigned. (Default: Default).

properties.name: remark
properties.description: (Optional) The remarks of the VPC. (Default: "").
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: vpc_id
properties.description: (Required) The short of ID of the requester VPC of the specific VPC Peering Connection to retrieve.

properties.name: peer_vpc_id
properties.description: (Required) The short ID of accepter VPC of the specific VPC Peering Connection to retrieve.
<hr/>

properties.name: peer_project_id
properties.description: (Optional) The ID of accepter project of the specific VPC Peering Connection to retrieve.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: cidr_block
properties.description: (Required) The cidr block of the desired subnet, format in "0.0.0.0/0", such as: 192.168.0.0/24.

properties.name: vpc_id
properties.description: (Required) The id of the VPC that the desired subnet belongs to.
<hr/>

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the desired subnet. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a name beginning with tf-subnet.

properties.name: remark
properties.description: (Optional) The remarks of the subnet. (Default: "").

properties.name: tag
properties.description: (Optional) A tag assigned to subnet, which contains at most 63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_', and '.'. If it is not filled in or a empty string is filled in, then default tag will be assigned. (Default: Default).
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: vpc_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of VPC linked to the Nat Gateway.

properties.name: subnet_ids
properties.description: (Required) The list of subnet ID under the VPC.

properties.name: eip_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of eip associate to the Nat Gateway.

properties.name: security_group
properties.description: (Required) The ID of the associated security group.

properties.name: enable_white_list
properties.description: (Required) The boolean value to Controls whether or not start the whitelist mode.
<hr/>

properties.name: white_list
properties.description: (Optional) The white list of instance under the Nat Gateway.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the Nat Gateway which contains 6-63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_' and '.'. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a name beginning with tf-nat-gateway-.

properties.name: remark
properties.description: (Optional) The remarks of the Nat Gateway. (Default: "").

properties.name: tag
properties.description: (Optional) A tag assigned to Nat Gateway, which contains at most 63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_', and '.'. If it is not filled in or a empty string is filled in, then default tag will be assigned. (Default: Default).

properties.name:
``
## Attributes Reference
properties.description: • `` ## Attributes Reference
In addition to all arguments above, the following attributes are exported:

properties.name: create_time
properties.description: The time of creation of Nat Gateway, formatted in RFC3339 time string.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: nat_gateway_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of the Nat Gateway.

properties.name: protocol
properties.description: (Required) The protocol of the Nat Gateway Rule. Possible values: tcp, udp.

properties.name: src_eip_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of eip associate to the Nat Gateway.

properties.name: src_port_range
properties.description: (Required) The range of port numbers of the eip, range: 1-65535. (eg: port or port1-port2).

properties.name: dst_ip
properties.description: (Required) The private ip of instance bound to the jNAT gateway.

properties.name: dst_port_range
properties.description: (Required) The range of port numbers of the private ip, range: 1-65535. (eg: port or port1-port2).
<hr/>

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the Nat Gateway Rule which contains 6-63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_' and '.'. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a name beginning with tf-nat-gateway-rule-.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: vpc_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of VPC linked to the VIP.

properties.name: subnet_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of subnet. If defined vpc_id, the subnet_id is Required.
<hr/>

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of VIP. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a name beginning with tf-vip-.

properties.name: tag
properties.description: (Optional) A tag assigned to VIP, which contains at most 63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_', and '.'. If it is not filled in or a empty string is filled in, then default tag will be assigned. (Default: Default).

properties.name: remark
properties.description: (Optional) The remarks of the VIP. (Default: "").
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: availability_zone
properties.description: (Required) Availability zone where database instance is located. Such as: "cn-bj2-02". You may refer to list of availability zone

properties.name: engine
properties.description: (Required) The type of database engine, possible values are: "mysql", "percona".

properties.name: list description
5.5/5.6/5.7 for mysql and percona engine.
properties.description: • 5.5/5.6/5.7 for mysql and percona engine.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of database instance, which contains 6-63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_', '.', ',', '[', ']', ':'. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a name beginning with tf-db-instance.

properties.name: list description
500GB if the memory chosen is equal or less than 6GB;
properties.description: • 500GB if the memory chosen is equal or less than 6GB;

properties.name: 1000GB if the memory chosen is from 8 to 16GB;
properties.description: • 1000GB if the memory chosen is from 8 to 16GB;

properties.name: 2000GB if the memory chosen is 24GB or 32GB;
properties.description: • 2000GB if the memory chosen is 24GB or 32GB;

properties.name: 3500GB if the memory chosen is 48GB or 64GB;
properties.description: • 3500GB if the memory chosen is 48GB or 64GB;

properties.name: 4500GB if the memory chosen is equal or more than 96GB;
properties.description: • 4500GB if the memory chosen is equal or more than 96GB;

properties.name: instance_type
properties.description: (Required) The type of database instance, please visit the instance type table.
<hr/>

properties.name: standby_zone
properties.description: (Optional) Availability zone where the standby database instance is located for the high availability database instance with multiple zone; The disaster recovery of data center can be activated by switching to the standby database instance for the high availability database instance.

properties.name: password
properties.description: (Optional) The password for the database instance which should have 8-30 characters. It must contain at least 3 items of Capital letters, small letter, numbers and special characters. The special characters include -_. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a password.

properties.name: port
properties.description: (Optional) The port on which the database accepts connections, the default port is 3306 for mysql and percona.

properties.name: charge_type
properties.description: (Optional) The charge type of db instance, possible values are: year, month and dynamic as pay by hour (specific permission required). (Default: month).

properties.name: duration
properties.description: (Optional) The duration that you will buy the db instance (Default: 1). The value is 0 when pay by month and the instance will be vaild till the last day of that month. It is not required when dynamic (pay by hour).

properties.name: vpc_id
properties.description: (Optional) The ID of VPC linked to the database instances.

properties.name: subnet_id
properties.description: (Optional) The ID of subnet.

properties.name: backup_count
properties.description: (Optional) Specifies the number of backup saved per week, it is 7 backups saved per week by default.

properties.name: backup_begin_time
properties.description: (Optional) Specifies when the backup starts, measured in hour, it starts at one o'clock of 1, 2, 3, 4 in the morning by default.

properties.name: backup_date
properties.description: (Optional) Specifies whether the backup took place from Sunday to Saturday by displaying 7 digits. 0 stands for backup disabled and 1 stands for backup enabled. The rightmost digit specifies whether the backup took place on Sunday, and the digits from right to left specify whether the backup took place from Monday to Saturday, it's mandatory required to backup twice per week at least. such as: digits "1100000" stands for the backup took place on Saturday and Friday.

properties.name: backup_black_list
properties.description: (Optional) The backup for database such as "test.%" or table such as "city.address" specified in the black lists are not supported.

properties.name: tag
properties.description: (Optional) A tag assigned to database instance, which contains at most 63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_', and '.'. If it is not filled in or a empty string is filled in, then default tag will be assigned. (Default: Default).
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: availability_zone
properties.description: (Required) Availability zone where Redis instance is located. Such as: "cn-bj2-02". You may refer to list of availability zone

properties.name: instance_type
properties.description: (Required) The type of Redis instance, please visit the instance type table for more details.
<hr/>

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of Redis instance, which contains 6-63 characters and only support English, numbers, '-', '_'. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a name beginning with tf-redis-instance.

properties.name: charge_type
properties.description: (Optional) The charge type of Redis instance, possible values are: year, month and dynamic as pay by hour (specific permission required). (Default: month).

properties.name: duration
properties.description: (Optional) The duration that you will buy the Redis instance (Default: 1). The value is 0 when pay by month and the instance will be valid till the last day of that month. It is not required when dynamic (pay by hour).

properties.name: tag
properties.description: (Optional) A tag assigned to Redis instance, which contains at most 63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_', and '.'. If it is not filled in or a empty string is filled in, then default tag will be assigned. (Default: Default).

properties.name: vpc_id
properties.description: (Optional) The ID of VPC linked to the Redis instance.

properties.name: subnet_id
properties.description: (Optional) The ID of subnet linked to the Redis instance.

properties.name: engine_version
properties.description: (active-standby Redis Required) The version of engine of active-standby Redis. Possible values are: 3.0, 3.2 and 4.0.

properties.name: password
properties.description: (Optional) The password for active-standby Redis instance which should have 6-36 characters. It must contain at least 3 items of Capital letters, small letter, numbers and special characters. The special characters include -_.
Note The active-standby Redis doesn't support to be created on multiple zones with Terraform.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: availability_zone
properties.description: (Required) Availability zone where Memcache instance is located. Such as: "cn-bj2-02". You may refer to list of availability zone

properties.name: instance_type
properties.description: (Required) The type of Memcache instance, please visit the instance type table for more details.
<hr/>

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of Memcache instance, which contains 6-63 characters and only support English, numbers, '-', '_'. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a name beginning with tf-memcache-instance.

properties.name: charge_type
properties.description: (Optional) The charge type of Memcache instance, possible values are: year, month and dynamic as pay by hour (specific permission required). (Default: month).

properties.name: duration
properties.description: (Optional) The duration that you will buy the Memcache instance (Default: 1). The value is 0 when pay by month and the instance will be valid till the last day of that month. It is not required when dynamic (pay by hour).

properties.name: tag
properties.description: (Optional) A tag assigned to Memcache instance, which contains at most 63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_', and '.'. If it is not filled in or a empty string is filled in, then default tag will be assigned. (Default: Default).

properties.name: vpc_id
properties.description: (Optional) The ID of VPC linked to the Memcache instance.

properties.name: subnet_id
properties.description: (Optional) The ID of subnet linked to the Memcache instance.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: vpc_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of VPC linked to the VPN Gateway.

properties.name: grade
properties.description: (Required) The type of the VPN Gateway. Possible values: standard, enhanced. standard recommended application scenario: Applicable to services with bidirectional peak bandwidth of 1M~50M; enhanced recommended application scenario: Suitable for services with bidirectional peak bandwidths of 50M~100M.

properties.name: eip_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of eip associate to the VPN Gateway.

properties.name: security_group
properties.description: (Required) The ID of the associated security group.
<hr/>

properties.name: charge_type
properties.description: (Optional) The charge type of VPN Gateway, possible values are: year, month and dynamic as pay by hour (specific permission required). (Default: month).

properties.name: duration
properties.description: (Optional) The duration that you will buy the VPN Gateway (Default: 1). The value is 0 when pay by month and the instance will be valid till the last day of that month. It is not required when dynamic (pay by hour).

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the VPN Gateway which contains 1-63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_' and '.'. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a name beginning with tf-vpn-gateway-.

properties.name: remark
properties.description: (Optional) The remarks of the VPN Gateway. (Default: "").

properties.name: tag
properties.description: (Optional) A tag assigned to VPN Gateway, which contains at most 63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_', and '.'. If it is not filled in or a empty string is filled in, then default tag will be assigned. (Default: Default).

properties.name:
``
## Attributes Reference

In addition to all arguments above, the following attributes are exported:

properties.name: create_time
properties.description: The creation time for VPN Gateway, formatted in RFC3339 time string.

properties.name: expire_time
properties.description: The expiration time for VPN Gateway, formatted in RFC3339 time string.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: ip_address
properties.description: (Required) The ip address of the VPN Customer Gateway.
<hr/>

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the VPN Customer Gateway which contains 1-63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_' and '.'. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a name beginning with tf-vpn-customer-gateway-.

properties.name: remark
properties.description: (Optional) The remarks of the VPN Customer Gateway. (Default: "").

properties.name: tag
properties.description: (Optional) A tag assigned to VPN Customer Gateway, which contains at most 63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_', and '.'. If it is not filled in or a empty string is filled in, then default tag will be assigned. (Default: Default).

properties.name:
``
## Attributes Reference
properties.description: • `` ## Attributes Reference
In addition to all arguments above, the following attributes are exported:

properties.name: create_time
properties.description: The creation time for VPN Customer Gateway, formatted in RFC3339 time string.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: vpc_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of VPC linked to the VPN Gateway Connection.

properties.name: vpn_gateway_id
properties.description: (Required) The ID of the VPN Customer Gateway.

properties.name: customer_gateway_id
properties.description: (Required) The grade of the VPN Gateway

properties.name: ike_config
properties.description: (Required) The configurations of IKE negotiation. Each ike_config supports fields documented below.

properties.name: ipsec_config
properties.description: (Required) The configurations of IPSec negotiation. Each ipsec_config supports fields documented below.
<hr/>

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Optional) The name of the VPN Gateway Connection which contains 1-63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers and special characters: -_.. If not specified, terraform will auto-generate a name beginning with tf-vpn-connection-.

properties.name: remark
properties.description: (Optional) The remarks of the VPN Gateway Connection. (Default: "").

properties.name: tag
properties.description: (Optional) A tag assigned to VPN Gateway Connection, which contains at most 63 characters and only support Chinese, English, numbers, '-', '_', and '.'. If it is not filled in or a empty string is filled in, then default tag will be assigned. (Default: Default).

properties.name: block-ike_config
properties.description: » Block ike_config
The ike_config mapping supports the following:

properties.name: pre_shared_key
properties.description: (Required) The key used for authentication between the VPN gateway and the Customer gateway which contains 1-128 characters and only support English, numbers and special characters: !@#$%^&*()_+-=[]:,./'~.

properties.name: ike_version
properties.description: (Optional) The version of the IKE protocol which only be supported IKE V1 protocol at present. Possible values: ikev1. (Default: ikev1)

properties.name: exchange_mode
properties.description: (Optional) The negotiation exchange mode of IKE V1 of VPN gateway. Possible values: main (main mode), aggressive (aggressive mode). (Default: main)

properties.name: encryption_algorithm
properties.description: (Optional) The encryption algorithm of IKE negotiation. Possible values: aes128, aes192, aes256, aes512, 3des. (Default: aes128).

properties.name: authentication_algorithm
properties.description: (Optional) The authentication algorithm of IKE negotiation. Possible values: sha1, md5, sha2-256. (Default: sha1)

properties.name: local_id
properties.description: (Optional) The identification of the VPN gateway.

properties.name: remote_id
properties.description: (Optional) The identification of the Customer gateway.

properties.name: dh_group
properties.description: (Optional) The Diffie-Hellman group used by IKE negotiation. Possible values: 1, 2, 5, 14, 15, 16. (Default:15)

properties.name: sa_life_time
properties.description: (Optional) The Security Association lifecycle as the result of IKE negotiation. Unit: second. Range: 600-604800. (Default: 86400)

properties.name: block-ipsec_config
properties.description: » Block ipsec_config
The ipsec_config mapping supports the following:

properties.name: local_subnet_ids
properties.description: (Required) The id list of Local subnet.

properties.name: remote_subnets
properties.description: (Required) The ip address list of remote subnet.

properties.name: protocol
properties.description: (Optional) The security protocol of IPSec negotiation. Possible values: esp, ah. (Default:esp)

properties.name: encryption_algorithm
properties.description: (Optional) The encryption algorithm of IPSec negotiation. Possible values: aes128, aes192, aes256, aes512, 3des. (Default: aes128).

properties.name: authentication_algorithm
properties.description: (Optional) The authentication algorithm of IPSec negotiation. Possible values: sha1, md5. (Default: sha1)

properties.name: pfs_dh_group
properties.description: (Optional) Whether the PFS of IPSec negotiation is on or off, disable as off, The Diffie-Hellman group as open. Possible values: disable, 1, 2, 5, 14, 15, 16. (Default:disable)

properties.name: sa_life_time
properties.description: (Optional) The Security Association lifecycle as the result of IPSec negotiation. Unit: second. Range: 1200-604800. (Default: 3600)

properties.name: sa_life_time_bytes
properties.description: (Optional) The Security Association lifecycle in bytes as the result of IPSec negotiation. Unit: second. Range: 1200-604800. (Default: 3600)
